  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_92735</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_92735</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Le spectre de la lumière</string>
            <string language="en">The spectrum of light</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Spektrum des Lichtes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O spectrum da luz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lo spettro di luce</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το φάσμα του φωτός</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El espectro de la luz</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration prouve que la lumière blanche  se compose de différentes couleurs qui composent le spectre léger.  Un prisme est employé pour disperser la lumière en ses  différentes couleurs.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that white light consists of different colours that make up the light spectrum.  A prism is used to disperse light into these different colours.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">couleurs</string>
            <string language="en">colours</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">dispersion</string>
            <string language="en">dispersion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">spectre de la lumière</string>
            <string language="en">light spectrum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">prisme</string>
            <string language="en">Prism</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß weißes Licht aus 
unterschiedlichen Farben besteht, die das helle Spektrum bilden. 
Ein Prisma wird benutzt, um Licht in diese unterschiedlichen 
Farben zu zerstreuen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que a luz branca 
consiste nas cores diferentes que fazem acima o spectrum claro. 
Um prisma é usado dispersar a luz nestas cores diferentes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che la luce bianca 
consiste dei colori differenti che compongono lo spettro chiaro. 
Un prisma è usato per disperdere la luce in questi colori 
differenti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι το άσπρο φως 
αποτελείται από τα διαφορετικά χρώματα που αποτελούν το ελαφρύ 
φάσμα. Ένα πρίσμα χρησιμοποιείται για να διασκορπίσει το 
φως σε αυτά τα διαφορετικά χρώματα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que la luz blanca 
consiste en diversos colores que hagan para arriba el espectro ligero.
Un prisma se utiliza para dispersar la luz en estos diversos 
colores.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Farben</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zerstreuung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">helles Spektrum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Prisma</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">cores</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">dispersão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">spectrum claro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Prisma</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">colori</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">dispersione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">spettro chiaro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Prisma</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χρώματα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διασπορά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ελαφρύ φάσμα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρίσμα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">colores</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">dispersión</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">espectro ligero</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Prisma</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
